name: L'Institut National de L'Audiovisuel (INA)
biography: The Institut national de l'audiovisuel (abbrev. INA), (lit.â€‰'National Audiovisual Institute') is a repository of all French radio and television audiovisual archives. Additionally it provides free access to archives of countries such as Afghanistan and Cambodia. It has its headquarters in Bry-sur-Marne.Since 2006, it has allowed free online consultation on a website called ina.fr with a search tool indexing 100,000 archives of historical programs, for a total of 20,000 hours.
